Build concatenating call

Source: R/utils.R
make_c_call.Rd

This function takes a vector of values and returns a c call. If the vector has only one element, the element is returned directly.

Usage 

make_c_call(choices)

Arguments

choices

A vector of values.

Value

A c call.

Examples 

# use non-exported function from teal.slice
make_c_call <- getFromNamespace("make_c_call", "teal.slice")
make_c_call(1:3)
#> c(1L, 2L, 3L)
make_c_call(1)
#> [1] 1

On this page

teal.slice is a part of the NEST and pharmaverse.
